attributes.action: Set up a non parliamentary body to govern education in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Every change in government brings a new education system, it's time for the education of our young people to be taken away from politicians and put in the hands of education experts.

Recent issues with GCSE grades, a raft of new types of school and the ever changing goal posts need to be addressed, let's bring this debate to Parliament before anymore children are affected.

Education should only ever be about what is best for our children. It should never be part of a political agenda again.
